entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 22.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 22. Humidex 27. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
